channel.title: OS-PK | The #1 OS Pking Server!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://os-pk.org/bin/images/logo.png[/img]
http://os-pk.org http://os-pk.org/community http://os-pk.org/ospk.jar
NOTE: 2X PKP RATE FOR FIRST MONTH!
[B][U]Why choose us?[/U][/B]
[I]OS-PK is a PVP-Based server that aims to entertain striving for nothing but perfection and endless fun just because we are PVP-Based it doesn't mean that we offer you nothing else than an amazing PVP experience, we also offer you flawless benificial skilling, many challenging bosses and other exciting game features.
For example boss pets, of course we also offer you a great pking experience, whether you like to pure PK or hybrid fight as a main, With this being said we have something for everyone, WHY DON'T YOU GIVE US A TRY?![/I]
[B][U]SOME OF OUR KEY FEATURES :[/U][/B]
[I]Instant PKING Quick-Spawn Sets Target System! Time Played System Reset Skills System Voting Rewards Custom Cosmetics OS Bosses OS Weapons Third Age Sword Third Age Wand Third Age Cloak Player VS Monsters Rewards Working Ring of Wealth Client Based Notifications Great Graphics Working Sounds Working Music Custom Interfaces 100% Ancients 100% Lunars 100% Perfect Switches Accurate Max Hit Formula Correct Accuracy Hit Formula Player Titles Well-Constructed Pk Shop Pet System Based on Bosses Pet Insurance Flawless Hybridding Active Community, In-Game & Forums Amazing Combat Constant Updates Automatic Donations & Voting System Daily Events Active Deep Wilderness Pking Orginazed Quest Tab Active Clan vs Clan Battles KillStreak System 50+ Achievements Leaderboards for Wilderness Pk Titles Working Mage Arena KDR System Experience Counter Working Specials Dedicated Staff Team With Past Experience Hosted On A Dedicated Server Complete Clan Chat System All Working Skills! Pest Control , Duel Arena, Barrows 100% Clans with Real Interfaces[/I] GodWars KBD Chaos Ele Dagonoth's AND ALL OSRS BOSSES!
[U][B]IMAGES [/B][/U]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kAISDMt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t5bhGsV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZHLtrFe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1fQqixa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/keBzUJp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gkowJms.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BmyWtLW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T1rf4hk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/db7Bxlj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xpG0Exm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HILqqDk.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: OS-PK | The #1 OS Pking Server!
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

Welliton_inc:

You cannot state that your server is the #1 PKing server when it isn’t. Also, your last image looks suspiciously like it isn’t from your server by the way you cropped it.

Seen too often. “#1 RSPS/Server” but doesn’t show reason why it is. Well to be specific, you said “#1 PK server.” As of right now, I am pretty sure Roat Pkz is the #1 PK server though. I am not here to bash your server, as I’m sure you have put a lot of work into it, but what is special about it that makes it any better than Roat Pkz. What more does it have to offer. With the media provided above, I don’t really see anything that stands out to me. Goodluck though

Read full topic
